title: Bajaj Auto to hike provision for deferred tax by Rs 211 cr post indexation benefit withdrawal
description: Bajaj Auto Ltd has stated a need to hike its deferred tax provision by Rs 211 crore due to recent changes in tax regulation on debt mutual funds. The company will adjust its accounting provisions to reflect the withdrawal of indexation benefits and a revised tax rate. This adjustment will impact Q2 FY25 financial results.
